trans-unit.source: Provides a base class to manage the serializers and type converters that insert [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] root objects into an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: 提供管理序列化程式和類型轉換子的基底類別的插入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]根物件到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PackageSerializationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，初始化新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PackageSerializationManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, saves the specified serialized object to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會儲存至指定的序列化的物件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。
